attributes.action: Put more exits onto the M11 (Stansted - Cambridge) to service the Saffron Walden area.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The M11 between Stansted Airport and Cambridge has two lanes and no exits for Saffron Walden, Elsenham, Newport & Clavering.  Because of this the local roads have become rat runs and suffer very high volumes of traffic & congestion.

This is compounded as the airport expands, forcing even more traffic through the towns and villages of Uttlesford.
